469740.name: Heart&Slash Soundtrack
469740.description:
Like the music in the game? With the Heart&Slash soundtrack DLC you can listen to the amazing tracks by Michael Chait whenever you please!

TRACK LIST:

  • 1.Main theme 02:40
  • 2.I ♥ You 03:07
  • 3.Battle With Heart! 02:42
  • 4.Heart V.s. Slash! 02:46
  • 5.Heart V.s. the B-dss Knight! 02:44
  • 6.Abandoned Robot Frank-y 02:18
  • 7.Heart Attack! 02:41
  • 8.City Street Funk 02:41
  • 9.Heart V.s. the Giant Sewer Monster 02:31
  • 10.Heart Of A Valkyrie 02:59
  • 11.Heart's Final Challenge 02:51
  • 12.Face the Final Battle! 02:32
  • 13.Love and Destruction 04:03
  • 14.I ♥ You (disco Remix) 02:20
  • 15.End Credits 01:48
469740.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 意大利语, 德语, 俄语
